page.title: 13LOCAL SCHOOL,SEAMILL
page.content: The{present school}is our{second {school.}Our old school was built in {1875,}and stood until 1975, its 100th anniversary. However it didn't stand much longer as in{May 1980}it was {burnt down.}Now in 1985 we still don't know the cause of the fire, whether it was an electrical fault or it was deliberate. However, in{February 1981 the{first turf}was dug for the new school, and in{1983 our new school was {completed.}It is a white building made of a kind of lumpy chip stone. It is an open plan school _ only a few classrooms have doors. Two of the classes have double glass doors which open out into a small patio with plants and a bench. We have two quiet rooms, one library, two staff rooms, one office and lastly, a gym hall which we use as an assembly hall and a dinner hall. The main building holds..
